member.name: P:loader.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Перезаписывает свойство CurrentUICulture текущего потока для всех обращений к ресурсу с помощью этого класса ресурса со строгой типизацией.

member.name: M:loader.Seal.Authenticate(System.String)
member.summary: Authentication method to allow the functions of BetterSeal, this must come before all others and only needs to be initated once

member.summary: Register method to allow the user to login to the authenticated program

member.name: M:loader.Seal.Register(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Register method to allow a user to register to the program you authenticated with.
member.param: (string) desired password, please make a confirmation for users to avoid invalid passwords.

member.name: M:loader.Seal.MakeRequest(System.String,System.String[],BetterSocks.Handler.MethodType)
member.summary: Make a webrequest through our secure network to avoid getting it sniffed.
member.param: Parameters in format like so id=1106

member.name: M:loader.Seal.GetVariable(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: The backup value for the variable, you can make it a string or whatever you want, this will only be returned upon failure of retrieving the value.
member.param: (dynamic) value that you want to spit back upon failure

member.summary: Get the userinfo of the currently logged in user
